CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Density functional theory ( DFT ) calculations was carried out to probe the molecular and electronic properties of the PffBB-n polymer by means of B3LYP / 6-311+(d,p) as a basis set in a vacuum using the repeating conjugated units of the polymer backbone in which all of the alkyl substitutions were replaced by ethyl groups to reduce the calculation time.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PffBB-n polymer |
| ethyl groups |
| B3LYP |
| 6-311+(d,p) basis set |
| vacuum |
| repeating conjugated units of the polymer backbone |

Explanation:

1. PffBB-n polymer: The name of the polymer that is being studied using DFT calculations.
2. ethyl groups: The alkyl substitutions that are being replaced to reduce calculation time.
3. B3LYP: The specific DFT method used for the calculations.
4. 6-311+(d,p) basis set: The basis set used for the calculations.
5. vacuum: The environment in which the calculations were carried out.
6. repeating conjugated units of the polymer backbone: The specific part of the polymer used for the calculations.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
|--------------|
| PffBB-n polymer |
| ethyl groups |

Explanation:

1. PffBB-n polymer: The name of the polymer that is being studied using DFT calculations.
2. ethyl groups: The specific type of alkyl substitutions being used in the calculations.
